ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 87
ygData.msgSnippet: I like druid and ranger pullers in certain zones over monks just for the carpet harmony effect.  Basically the ranger or druid carpet cast s harmony till he
ygData.messageBody:
I like druid and ranger pullers in certain zones over monks just for the
carpet harmony effect. Basically the ranger or druid carpet cast's
harmony till he reach's the MoB he wants. He then cast's at the MoB and
pulls him from his original spot through the carpet cast harmony zone
without pulling anything else. Unrest/Mistmoore/Cazic are very nice
places for this. I have yet to go on a serious LGuk trip yet but I assume
they would do just as good there.

Monks I would have to say are tied for number one with druid/ranger if not
the best. They can pull multiple mobs....FD....loose one or two, pop up
and pull the remaining ones. Rinse Repeat until they get the desired
effect or MoB. They can also just FD long enough to cancel the entire
pull altogether....

Sligo
Cazic Thule
Silent Fist
